plugins.prepareCmd: VERSION=${nextRelease.version} && if [[ $VERSION == v* ]]; then VERSION=$(echo $VERSION | sed 's/^v//'); fi && mkdir -p ./artifacts && dotnet build FlowRight.sln --configuration Release --no-restore -p:Version=$VERSION && dotnet pack FlowRight.sln --configuration Release --no-build --output ./artifacts -p:PackageVersion=$VERSION
